purpose: Provides a reference application for orchestrating multiple AI agents to automate tasks based on user input.
principle: Built on Semantic Kernel, it leverages Azure Foundry and Azure Cosmos DB to coordinate and manage AI agents.
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with APIs for integrating custom agents and extending functionalities.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited documentation and features under development.
name: Multi-Agent-Custom-Automation-Engine-Solution-Accelerator
description: The Multi-Agent Custom Automation Engine Solution Accelerator is an AI-driven system that manages a group of AI agents to accomplish tasks based on user input. Powered by Semantic Kernel, Azure Foundry, Azure Cosmos DB, and infrastructure services, it provides a reference application, allowing you to hit the ground running.
highlight: Manages a group of AI agents to accomplish tasks using Semantic Kernel and Azure services.
